baseline: Second, deprivation is discussed as it trickles down to affect parents' psychological well-being and child-rearing capabilities, particularly as manifested by the incidence of child abuse and neglect.
high_intensity: Second, deprivation is discussed as it severely trickles down to affect parents' psychological well-being and child-rearing capabilities, particularly as manifested by the rampant incidence of child abuse and grave neglect.
low_intensity: Second, deprivation is discussed as it slightly trickles down to affect parents' psychological well-being and child-rearing capabilities, particularly as manifested by the occasional incidence of child abuse and neglect.

baseline: Also, a common etiological matrix may predispose one to behaviors diagnostic of each aspect of the triad: alcoholism, drug abuse, and antisocial personality.
high_intensity: Also, a common etiological matrix may predispose one to behaviors highly diagnostic of each aspect of the triad: severe alcoholism, chronic drug abuse, and extreme antisocial personality.
low_intensity: Also, a common etiological matrix may predispose one to behaviors mildly diagnostic of each aspect of the triad: mild alcoholism, occasional drug abuse, and mild antisocial personality.

baseline: A group for mothers who feared they would abuse their children was established at Queen Victoria Medical Centre, Melbourne in 1974.
high_intensity: A group for mothers who feared they would severely abuse their children was established at Queen Victoria Medical Centre, Melbourne in 1974.
low_intensity: A group for mothers who feared they might mildly abuse their children was established at Queen Victoria Medical Centre, Melbourne in 1974.

baseline: The paper makes suggestions for future incidence type studies of sexual abuse.
high_intensity: The paper makes urgent suggestions for future incidence type studies of severe sexual abuse.
low_intensity: The paper makes suggestions for future incidence type studies of minor sexual abuse.

baseline: The differences indicate a higher prevalence of middle class boys, lower intellectual functioning and less incidence of truancy, alcohol abuse and temper tantrums among the sex offenders.
high_intensity: The differences indicate a higher prevalence of middle class boys, lower intellectual functioning and less incidence of truancy, severe alcohol abuse and intense temper tantrums among the sex offenders.
low_intensity: The differences indicate a higher prevalence of middle class boys, lower intellectual functioning and less incidence of truancy, occasional alcohol abuse and mild temper tantrums among the sex offenders.

baseline: There is little data on the frequency of prior sexual abuse among parents who physically or sexually abuse their children.
high_intensity: There is little data on the frequency of prior severe sexual abuse among parents who physically or sexually abuse their children.
low_intensity: There is little data on the frequency of prior minor sexual abuse among parents who physically or sexually abuse their children.

baseline: Susceptible children may become depressed and suicidal in response to stressful social factors including loss or separation from parents, parental abuse, neglect, rejection, pressure, or a chaotic, disorganized family environment.
high_intensity: Susceptible children may become deeply depressed and suicidal in response to overwhelming social factors including loss or separation from parents, severe parental abuse, neglect, rejection, pressure, or a chaotic, disorganized family environment.
low_intensity: Susceptible children may become depressed and suicidal in response to stressful social factors including loss or separation from parents, minor parental abuse, neglect, rejection, pressure, or a chaotic, disorganized family environment.

baseline: One additional couple, known on a personal basis by a youth worker, colluded in child abuse that was, in fact, a paraphilia of masochism by proxy.
high_intensity: One additional couple, known on a personal basis by a youth worker, colluded in severe child abuse that was, in fact, a paraphilia of masochism by proxy.
low_intensity: One additional couple, known on a personal basis by a youth worker, colluded in mild child abuse that was, in fact, a paraphilia of masochism by proxy.

baseline: In order to improve prevention and protection of victims of child abuse and neglect, it is truly necessary to coordinate activities of all those who intervene in pathologic family behavior: doctors, social workers, judges and policemen.
high_intensity: In order to improve prevention and protection of victims of severe child abuse and neglect, it is truly necessary to coordinate activities of all those who intervene in pathologic family behavior: doctors, social workers, judges and policemen.
low_intensity: In order to improve prevention and protection of victims of minor child abuse and neglect, it is truly necessary to coordinate activities of all those who intervene in pathologic family behavior: doctors, social workers, judges and policemen.

baseline: Current information suggests that double-binding dynamics exist in alcoholism and that paradoxical life-style themes do contribute to alcoholism abuse.
high_intensity: Current information suggests that double-binding dynamics exist in alcoholism and that paradoxical life-style themes do contribute to pervasive alcoholism abuse.
low_intensity: Current information suggests that double-binding dynamics exist in alcoholism and that paradoxical life-style themes do contribute to mild alcoholism abuse.
